about_the_game: The Threefold Recital Soundtrack features 48 original tracks from the game, meticulously crafted by Mi Lu Music and projectlights. Each piece is deeply woven into the game's atmosphere, Lividly portraying the wonders of the Trinity world. The melodies intertwine with the highs and lows of adventure, the clash of emotions, and those unforgettable moments within the story. We hope that when the music plays, it brings back memories of your journey—every little moment, every joy and sorrow shared with the characters.
